title: How to Bypass Google Safe Browsing on Firefox for a Specific Domain in a Local Network?
content: Hello everyone! I’m looking to see if there’s a way to bypass Google Safe Browsing on Firefox for a specific domain and apply this exception across all users on an internal network, similar to how it can be configured in Google Chrome. Does anyone have experience or tips on setting up this kind of exception in Firefox, especially for a business or local network environment? Thanks!

title: Firefox add ons not working
content: I guess there was an update to Firefox today because everything about my browser was a mess! >:( I have always had the Honey and Pinterest pin it buttons on my toolbar, and they have worked just fine. Now that this nightmare "update" happened, they don't show anymore, even though they are enabled in my settings and all permissions are checked. I am NOT very techy, so please don't reply with a long technical response that requires me to spend an hour trying to fix it. The buttons showed before, so why not now?! Please help! I've cleared cache and cookies, cleared history, everything I can think of and nothing is working. :'( TIA

title: Loosing opened tabs when leaving private window open on closing Firefox
content:
Hi!

I am used to Firefox with multiple tabs and occasionally, I need private windows of Firefox due to reloading of websites, etc.

Each time I close my Firefox non-private window whilst the private one is still open (mostly by mistake), I lose my browser session with multiple tab completely. Also the recovery-mechanisms I found in the documentation database don't work.

Anyway, I wouldn't want to recover my sessions, I'd rather like Firefox not to behave that way. It is possible to enhance Firefox in such a way that it does NOT forget its sessions if the user closes a private window after the main non-private one has already been closed?

Thanks in advance, Dennis

title: Setting tiles
content:
Auf der Firefox Startseite befinden sich Kacheln. Diese kann man mit dem drei-Punkte Menü anpassen. Bei "Eine benutzerdefinierte Grafik anwenden..." erscheint ein Eingabefeld. Wenn ich eine Link Adresse die sich auf meinem PC befindet eingebe erscheint die Fehlermeldung: "Grafik konnte nicht geladen werden. Verwenden Sie eine andere Adresse." Was muss ich eingeben um eine benutzerdefinierte Grafik zu erhalten?

There are tiles on the Firefox start page. You can customize these using the three-dot menu. When you click on "Apply a custom graphic..." an input field appears. If I enter a link address that is on my PC, the error message appears: "Image could not be loaded. Use a different address." What do I have to enter to get a custom graphic?
creator: michael.winkelkotte

title: Dark images darken the entire page
content: I am using light visual mode. Whenever I am viewing a dark image, e.g. a relatively dark photo in a newspaper article, this darkens the entire page, including the menu/bar area. This happens as the dark image is scrolled to become visible. Normal bright views are restored once the dark image is out of view. And similarly my youtube music page, which has a black background, is horribly black now. I a musing windows11. Thanks.

title: Account Data did not sync after re-login
content:
Hi - Wondering if anyone has ideas on how to fix this and recover my bookmarks:

1) Had to reset my Windows 10 laptop which uninstalled Firefox. 2) When I reinstalled firefox and logged into my account, none of my extensions, bookmarks downloaded or synced 3) I synced my phone (logged into my account correctly with my data) to the firefox on my computer (via QR code), hoping that would fix my laptop's browser syncing issue. Instead it deleted all my phone's firefox bookmarks when it synced with my computer (ugh!)

Is there a way to recover my bookmarks from my phone's firefox or they are all lost? My phone's firefox still has the history but no longer my bookmarks.

Thanks!
creator: scware12

title: non riesco più recuperare il codoce di back up ed ho dei problemi con l'accont
content:
Ho 2 distinti problemi ma cheprobabilmente hanno avuto la stessa origine. Inoltre, non riconosce i codici dell'app per l'autenticaizone a 2 fattori; 2) Infine, non riesco più recuperare il codice di back up
